home.p1: Welcome to my webpage. I'm glad you're here :)

aboutme.text: My name is Damian. Although, everyday in the IT society I make use of my fancy 'Nonemoticoner' nickname. Currently, I'm a student of third year of Mechatronics Engineering on AGH University of Science and Technology. Living in the most beautiful city which is Krak√≥w in Poland. I do many things. One of them is love to Node related technologies while JavaScript is my truly favourite programming language.

projects.name: Battleship
projects.description: A small web application of commonly known game Battleship with multiplayer.

projects.name: password-creator
projects.description: A Node module for creating randomized passwords from chosen set of signs.
